Bed & Breakfast

Our three beautifully appointed bedrooms are all individually furnished with views over the gardens where you are able to enjoy the peace and tranquility of the countryside.

The Dorchester

A beautiful romantic room with views over the front garden and countryside.

The Winterborne

A beautiful room with views over the rear garden and countryside.

The Portesham

A lovely room with views over the rear garden and countryside.

Holiday Lets

Pump Cottage offers self-contained holidays lets, homes that allow for self-catered holiday breaks in the beautiful Dorset countrisde.

Pump Lodge

A one bedroom, self-contained home nestled in the grounds of Pump Cottage.
